author: dain
msg: Set commons-beanutils and commons-digester to INFO because they dump
way too much junk to the logs at DEBUG.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch

author: dain
msg: When the date is parsed and converted into a Date object the timezone is lost, so
later when the calendar is created it is created in the machine local timezone.  To
fix this I explicitly set the timezone on the calendar.

author: jboynes
msg: GERONIMO-41,42,43 patch from Aaron Mulder (javadoc only)
